an4.7:1.1: “Cattarome, bhikkhave, viyatta vinita visarada bahussuta dhammadhara dhammanudhammappatipanna sangham sobhenti.
an4.7:1.3: Bhikkhu, bhikkhave, viyatto vinito visarado bahussuto dhammadharo dhammanudhammappatipanno sangham sobheti.
an4.7:1.4: Bhikkhuni, bhikkhave, viyatta vinita visarada bahussuta dhammadhara dhammanudhammappatipanna sangham sobheti.
an4.7:1.5: Upasako, bhikkhave, viyatto vinito visarado bahussuto dhammadharo dhammanudhammappatipanno sangham sobheti.
an4.7:1.6: Upasika, bhikkhave, viyatta vinita visarada bahussuta dhammadhara dhammanudhammappatipanna sangham sobheti.
an4.7:1.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro viyatta vinita visarada bahussuta dhammadhara dhammanudhammappatipanna sangham sobhentiti.
an4.7:2.1: Yo hoti viyatto ca visarado ca,
